name: Carrom Mayhem
description:
Enjoy the mayhem caused when you miss a hit in this non-peaceful board game.

This game is made for Supersensory Megamix '21 Gamejam with theme "Sensory Overload"

With that in mind, this game is designed to overload the player in the bullet-hell of their own making. Don't worry too much though, you'll always have a chance to right the miss-hits. It is up to you to regain control in this Mayhem.

GOOD LUCK!

_____________________________________________________________

One more thing, this game has 2 modes:

SINGLE and LOCAL MULTIPLAYER.

Grab a friend and play the local offline Multiplayer mode. It is even more fun.

Because, every mishit they make will effect you as well. So get ready to yell at each other & try surviving longer while competing to reach the target.

_____________________________________________________________

CONTROLS:

Single Player:

Left Arrow: Turn Anti-clockwise

Right Arrow: Turn Clockwise

Multiplayer:

Player-1 : A and D

Player-2 : <- and ->
